channel.title: kendogrid on Nazmul's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in kendogrid on Nazmul's Blog

item.title: Show default image if image field NULL in kendo grid
item.description: If image field is null in kendo grid and you want to show default image then use this code.It will show default image if image field null. { field: "Photo", title: "Photo", template: function(dataItem) { return kendo.template( '<img src="#= Photo #" alt="image" width="100px" height="100px" />' )({Photo: dataItem.Photo || 'Add Your Default Image Path Here'}); } width: 100 }
